paragraph.text: this is a course in miracles it is a required course only the time you take it is voluntary free will does not mean that you can establish the curriculum it means only that you may elect what you want to take at a given time the course does not aim at teaching the meaning of love for that is beyond what can be taught it does aim however at removing the blocks to the awareness of loves presence which is your natural inheritance the opposite of love is fear but what is all encompassing can have no opposite
this course can therefore be summed up very simply in this way
nothing real can be threatened nothing unreal exists
herein lies the peace of god
